how to kill gnome-panel without reloadin: 'sudo chmod -x /usr/bin/gnome-panel && killall gnome-panel' conversely to set it back, 'sudo chmod +x /usr/bin/gnome-panel && gnome-panel & disown'
chmod +/-x toggles the executable bit of the file
